tool_description: Retrieves credit information and financial history from credit bureaus to assess customer creditworthiness and verify identity through financial records.

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format

ssn_or_id.description: Social Security Number or national ID number

report_type.description: Type of credit report: basic, standard, or comprehensive

include_score.description: Whether to include credit score in response

error_messages: Identity verification failed: Provided information does not match credit bureau records.
Invalid SSN format: Ensure SSN or national ID follows proper format for the jurisdiction.
No credit file found: No credit history found for the provided information.
Invalid bureau preference: Use recognized bureau names like Experian, Equifax, or TransUnion.
Invalid report type: Use one of [basic, standard, comprehensive].
usage: Provide customer's identifying information including name, DOB, SSN/ID, and address. Configure bureau preferences and report type based on verification needs.

credit_file_found.description: Whether a credit file was located

credit_score.description: Credit score if available and requested

identity_verified.description: Whether identity was verified through credit records

address_match.description: Address verification result: exact, partial, or no_match

account_summary.description: Summary of credit accounts and payment history
